segments.text: We have settled the question of price , quality and quantity . Now I am calling to talk about the terms of payment . What are your terms of payment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . We only accept the payment to be made by confirmed and irrevocable L \ C , payable against shipping documents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Payment by LC is the safest method , but could you make an exception and accept DA or DP ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid not . That is our usual practice , because we are sure we will get the right amount of money that way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about the cost of delivery ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We would like to do it in accordance with an F . O . B .
